channel.title: CVE Feed for ThimPress -- LearnPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ThimPress -- LearnPress

item.title: CVE-2024-39641|2024-08-26T20:56:35.651Z -- thimpress -- learnpress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ThimPress LearnPress.This issue affects LearnPress: from n/a through 4.2.6.8.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-39642|2024-08-13T10:47:20.445Z -- thimpress -- learnpress
item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in ThimPress LearnPress allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects LearnPress: from n/a through 4.2.6.8.2.
